Class Segment1

  • java.lang.Object
    • Segment1
  • public class Segment1
extends java.lang.Object
    Segment1 represents a line (parallel to the x-axis) using two Points.
    Version:
    24-11-2020
    Author:
    Simon Lousky

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Segment1​(double leftX, double leftY, double rightX, double rightY)
      Constructs a new segment using 4 specified x y coordinates: Two coordinates for the left point and two coordinates for the right point.
      Segment1​(Point left, Point right)
      Constructs a new segment using two Points.
      Segment1​(Segment1 other)
      Copy Constructor.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Segment1

        public Segment1​(Point left,
                Point right)
        Constructs a new segment using two Points. If the y coordinates are different, change the y of the right point to be equal to the y of the left point.
        Parameters:
        left - the left point of the segment
        right - the right point of the segment

      • Segment1

        public Segment1​(double leftX,
                double leftY,
                double rightX,
                double rightY)
        Constructs a new segment using 4 specified x y coordinates: Two coordinates for the left point and two coordinates for the right point. If the y coordinates are different, change the y of the right point to be equal to the y of the left point.
        Parameters:
        leftX - X value of left point
        leftY - Y value of left point
        rightX - X value of right point
        rightY - Y value of right point

      • Segment1

        public Segment1​(Segment1 other)
        Copy Constructor. Construct a segment using a reference segment.
        Parameters:
        other - the reference segment

      • changeSize

        public void changeSize​(double delta)
        Change the segment size by moving the right point by delta. Will be implemented only for a valid delta: only if the new right point remains the right point.
        Parameters:
        delta - the length change

      • pointOnSegment

        boolean pointOnSegment​(Point p)
        Check if a point is located on the segment.
        Parameters:
        p - a point to be checked
        Returns:
        True if p is on this segment
